metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3606 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in Linux Kernel. It has been classified asproblematic. This affects the function find_prog_by_sec_insn of the filetools/lib/bpf/libbpf.c of the component BPF. The manipulation leads to nullpointer dereference. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue.The identifier VDB-211749 was assigned to this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: dwarves-dfsg package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
